description.value:
More advanced void-bait that sends weak psychic signals discernable by astropaths and Navigators. Requires 1d5+1 hours and -40 Tech-Use Test to set up. Can be detected up to 10 Light Years away by a Psynscience Test. Can be determined as false with Scrutiny test with -10 per DoS on the Tech-Use Test.

Requirements

Good or Best Quality Voidbait.

Effect: Extremely Rare

Notes: -
